name: thebluedoor
tag_list: public-relations, pr, agency, company, firm, surrey, communications, marketing, seo, social-media
overview:
thebluedoor is a Public Relations agency based in Farnham, Surrey who execute tradional and digital PR communications for a variety of clients in a range of business sectors.

thebluedoor has an integrated approach, combining traditional and digital medias and platforms thereby delivering a variety of services including PR, SEO, social media and marketing communications.

thebluedoor’s offices in Farnham, Surrey are 45 minutes from London by train, and are also close to the M25, M3 and M4, making them well connected for the rest of the U.K.

offices.address1: B1 Endeavour Place, Coxbridge Business Park
